question: When the water is cold Maya swims a kilometer in 19 minutes. When the water is warm Maya swims a kilometer in 7 minutes more than twice as long. How much longer does Maya take to swim 7 kilometers on a hot day than a cold day?
answer:
Cold water kilometer = <<19=19>>19 minutes
Warm water kilometer = 7+2*19=45 minutes
7 kilometers in cold water: 7(19)=<<7*19=133>>133 minutes
7 kilometers in warm water: 7(45)=<<7*45=315>>315 minutes
Maya takes 315-133=<<315-133=182>>182 minutes longer
#### 182
